Title: Series: The Life of the Virgin
Description: Rest on the Flight to Egypt; in the yard of a ruined house St Joseph mending a wooden trough, the Virgin sitting and spinning, the cradle with the sleeping infant Christ next to her, various putti and angels assisting Engraving
Curator's comments: After a series of 20 woodcuts on the Life of the Virgin by Albrecht Dürer. For impressions by Dürer on same subject see E.2.185; 1895,0122.655; 1895,0122.635 and E.3.90.
